title: X Factor: Celebrity: Megan McKenna reduces Nicole to TEARS... but is SLATED by Simon Cowell
text:
Megan McKenna took to the X Factor: Celebrity stage on Saturday night as she battled the other 12 acts for a place in the next round.

The former TOWIE star, 27, pulled off a moving performance of her own original song, which left Nicole Scherzinger in tears.

However, Simon Cowell wasn't as kind, with the music mogul blasting the star over her outfit choice.

Mixed criticism: X Factor: Celebrity's Megan McKenna reduced Nicole to tears with her performance but was slated by Simon Cowell over her outfit choice

Keen to boost her credibility as a singer-songwriter, Megan made the bold move to perform her own song, titled This.

Dressed to impress on the night, the star donned a glittering, embellished jumpsuit, with dramatic white feathered fringing across the bust and legs.

Her hauntingly beautiful performance left viewers touched, with host Dermot O'Leary also left visibly moved.

Wiping away tears, an emotional Nicole said of the performance: 'Baby girl, you just brought me to tears.That was a real heartfelt performance.

Emotional: The former TOWIE star, 27, pulled off a moving performance of her own original song, which left Nicole Scherzinger in tears

Harsh: However, Simon Cowell wasn't as kind, with the music mogul blasting the star over her outfit choice

'And those were real lyrics straight from the heart. You’re just in a league of your own Megan, you really are.'

Wrapping up her comments, she added: ‘I love you and I have to have that song as cause I’m gonna listen to it on repeat.'

However, Simon wasn't as complimentary as he soon ripped into Megan's choice of attire, despite loving her song.

He ranted: 'Love the song, hate the outfit! I’ll tell you why I say that, This isn’t whatever the Essex thing is, this is a different show.

'If you really are going to take this seriously, if this was a normal TV performance, I would say to you it’s so distracting.

Big chance: Megan McKenna took to the X Factor: Celebrity stage on Saturday night as she battled the other 12 acts for a place in the next round

Wow: Dressed to impress on the night, the star donned a glittering, embellished jumpsuit, with dramatic white feathered fringing across the bust and legs

Stunning: Her hauntingly beautiful performance left viewers touched, with host Dermot O'Leary also left visibly moved

'It reminds everyone of you being a reality star, which I know you want to move away from that and all I want to do is concentrate on the song and the song was beautiful, so that’s my only criticism,'

As Megan stood on the stage crestfallen, Dermot leapt to her defence, telling Simon: 'She can wear what she likes!'

To which Simon responded: 'I know that but I was just saying what I feel.'

The other judges also spoke up for Megan, with Louis telling Simon that he was 'really unfair on her'.

Moved: Wiping away tears, an emotional Nicole said of the performance: 'Baby girl, you just brought me to tears.That was a real heartfelt performance

Shock remark: 'Love the song, hate the outfit! I’ll tell you why I say that, This isn’t whatever the Essex thing is, this is a different show'

While Nicole remarked: 'I think you look gorgeous Megan.You look beautiful.'

X Factor viewers at home were quick to call out Simon for his comments, with many claiming that he shouldn't judge her dress sense.

'@Megan_Mckenna_looked absolutely beautiful tonight @SimonCowell should never of judged her on her outfit when he wears the same black shirt over and OVER on every show,' tweeted one person.

While another fumed: 'Simon has the audacity to talk about her dress sense #XFactorCelebrity.'

On her side: As Megan stood on the stage crestfallen, Dermot leapt to her defence, telling Simon: 'She can wear what she likes!'

A third fan said: 'Simon graces our screens with them v neck t-shirts and then jeans near enough every week. He has no right to comment on fashion.'

A fourth viewers ranted: 'Simon Cowell's got a cheek criticising someone on their outfit choice! Plain rude!.'

While a fifth watcher made their feelings abundantly clear, writing: 'SHUT UP SIMON!!!.'

X Factor: Celebrity continues Satuday at 8.20pm on ITV.
